name: ipShield
tagline: A framework for enforcing context-aware privacy on Android
body: **ipShield** gives you **richer privacy control** over sensor data on Android phones.  Right now, many of the common sensors on your phone--along with the information they can yield--go unpoliced by the OS's data protection schemes.  ipShield takes advantage of Android's virtualized execution environment to give you control over **who can access your sensor information** and **how much of it they can see**.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
